channel.title: Business / Big Tech on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Business / Big Tech on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Big Tech Companies in the US Have Been Told Not to Apply the Digital Services Act
item.description: The FTC notified companies like Google, Meta, and Apple that they must not apply the Digital Services Act, which regulates digital platforms, if it jeopardizes the freedom of Americans.

item.title: Big Tech Companies in the US Have Been Told Not to Apply the Digital Services Act
item.description: The FTC notified companies like Google, Meta, and Apple that they must not apply the Digital Services Act, which regulates digital platforms, if it jeopardizes the freedom of Americans.

item.title: Trump Is Betting Big on Intel. Will the Chips Fall His Way?
item.description: The Trump administration is aiming to take an equity stake in Intel, according to US commerce secretary Howard Lutnick. Experts say the unconventional deal could backfire.

item.title: Trump Is Betting Big on Intel. Will the Chips Fall His Way?
item.description: The Trump administration is aiming to take an equity stake in Intel, according to US commerce secretary Howard Lutnick. Experts say the unconventional deal could backfire.

item.title: What Does Palantir Actually Do?
item.description: Palantir is often called a data broker, a data miner, or a giant database of personal information. In reality, it’s none of these—but even former employees struggle to explain it.

item.title: What Does Palantir Actually Do?

item.title: WIRED Roundup: ChatGPT Goes Full Demon Mode
item.description: On today’s episode of Uncanny Valley, our senior business editor joins us to talk Meta, brain aging, and ChatGPT’s recent dark turn.

item.title: WIRED Roundup: ChatGPT Goes Full Demon Mode

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg Details Meta’s Plan for Self-Improving, Superintelligent AI
item.description: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg told investors that his new research lab will focus on building AI models that can learn with minimal human input.

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg Details Meta’s Plan for Self-Improving, Superintelligent AI
item.description: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg told investors that his new research lab will focus on building AI models that can learn with minimal human input.

item.title: Some Cities in China Are Advertising Exclusive Subsidies for Huawei-Powered Cars
item.description: WIRED identified 10 local governments in China that are offering discounts to consumers who choose cars running Huawei software. It’s not always clear who is footing the bill.
